Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner. Perused the
affidavit dated 17.10.2013 filed by the 3 respondent.

2. Learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that the offence
alleged against the petitioner is punishable under Section 406 of the Indian
Penal Code. Since the matter has been settled, | find that the petition can
be allowed. Annexure-B FIR is hereby quashed

Beet
2014/KER/53

A.HARIPRASAD, J.
Cri.M.C. No.1723 of 2010
Dated this the 1* day of January, 2014.
ORDER
Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner. Perused the
affidavit dated 17.10.2013 filed by the 3 respondent.

2. Learned counsel for the petitioner submitted that the offence
alleged against the petitioner is punishable under Section 406 of the Indian
Penal Code. Since the matter has been settled, | find that the petition can
be allowed. Annexure-B FIR is hereby quashed.

All pending interlocutory applications will stand dismissed.
A. HARIPRASAD, JUDGE.
